Removing a Server Configuration

You can remove a server configuration from your list of available configurations directly with the Server Administration dialog or indirectly when you create a new project or open an existing project. Only servers that are currently shut down can be deleted.

To remove server access:

  1. Do one of the following:

    • Click New Project on the toolbar. The New Project Wizard dialog opens.

    • Click Open Project  on the toolbar. The Open Project Wizard dialog opens.

    • On a computer that has the Server installed, select Start > Programs > StarTeam > StarTeam Server x.x > StarTeam Server. Alternatively, from the client, you can select Start > Programs > StarTeam > StarTeam client_name > Server Administration  (available with custom installations only). These actions display the Server Administration dialog.

  2. Select a server configuration.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • On the New Project Wizard or Open Project Wizard, click the Delete Server button. The Delete Server dialog opens.

    • On the Server Administration dialog, click the Delete Server icon or select Server > Delete Server.

  4. When a message appears, asking you to confirm the decision, click OK.
